Samsung Galaxy S6 - description and parameters

Samsung Galaxy S6 supports frequency bands GSM , HSPA , LTE. Official announcement date is March 201Samsung Galaxy S6

Released 2015, April Size and Dimensions Measurements143.4 x 70.5 x 6.8 mm (5.65 x 2.78 x 0.27 in) Weight138 g (4.87 oz) DesignCorning Gorilla Glass 4 back panel SIMNano-SIM - Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified) Display (type and size) TypeSuper AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size5.1 inches Resolution1440 x 2560 pixels MultitouchYes ProtectionCorning Gorilla Glass 4 - TouchWiz UI System and processor information OSAndroid OS, v5.0.2 (Lollipop) actualized v5.1.1 (Lollipop) ChipsetExynos 7420 Central processing unitQuad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57 Graphics processing unitMali-T760MP8 Memory bank Slot for memory cardNo Built-in 3 GB RAM 32/64/128 GB Camera Primary16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm, OIS, autofocus, LED flash, quality control Features1/2.6" sensor size, 1.12 Ä¾m pixel size, geo-tagging, quick tap focus, face detection, Auto HDR, panorama Video2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, 720p@120fps, HDR, dual-video rec., quality control Secondary5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm, 1440p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR Sound Different alarm typesVibration; MP3, WAV ringtones Main speaker Yes 3.5mm jack Yes Communication WLANWi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot Bluetoothv4.1, A2DP, LE, apt-X GPSYes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS NFCYes IrDAYes RadioNo USBmicroUSB v2.0, USB Host Features SensorsFingerprint recognition, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer, heart rate monitor, SpO2 MessagingSMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM BrowserHTML5 JavaNo - Wireless charging (Qi/PMA) - market dependent - ANT+ support - S -Voice dictation and cammands recognition - OneDrive (115 GB online storage) - noise cancellation feature - MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player - MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+/FLAC player - Photo/video editor - Document editor Battery Built-in Li-Ion 2550 mAh battery Stand-by Talk timeUp to 17 h (3G) Music playerUp to 49 h Other ColorsWhite Pearl, Black Sapphire, Gold Platinum, Blue Topaz
